LamBox.Empty:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Empty
      constructors:

Demo.Bool:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Bool
      constructors:
        r#false (0 arg(s))
        r#true (0 arg(s))

Demo.List:
  mutual inductive(s):
    List
      constructors:
        empty (0 arg(s))
        cons (2 arg(s))

Demo.test:
  constant declaration:
    body: Demo.List{0}{1}
            Demo.Bool{0}{1}
            Demo.List{0}{1}
              Demo.Bool{0}{0}
              Demo.List{0}{1}
                Demo.Bool{0}{1} Demo.List{0}{1} Demo.Bool{0}{0} Demo.List{0}{0}

Demo.or:
  constant declaration:
    body: λ _ _ →
            case<Demo.Bool{0},0> @1 of
              λ<[]> @0
              λ<[]> Demo.Bool{0}{1}

Demo.and:
  constant declaration:
    body: λ _ _ →
            case<Demo.Bool{0},0> @1 of
              λ<[]> Demo.Bool{0}{0}
              λ<[]> @0

Demo.Nat:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Nat
      constructors:
        zero (0 arg(s))
        suc (1 arg(s))

Demo.add:
  constant declaration:
    body: μ rec ->
            λ _ _ →
              case<Demo.Nat{0},0> @1 of
                λ<[]> @0
                λ<[_]> Demo.Nat{0}{1} (@3 @0 @1)

Demo.times:
  constant declaration:
    body: μ rec ->
            λ _ _ →
              case<Demo.Nat{0},0> @1 of
                λ<[]> Demo.Nat{0}{0}
                λ<[_]> Demo.add @1 (@3 @0 @1)
main program: [Demo.test]
